DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the experiences and needs of patients with a high-grade glioma and their caregivers. Semi-structured interviews with patients and caregivers will be conducted and analysed using Grounded-Theory approach.
DOC.brief_title: Experiences and Needs of Patients With a High-grade Glioma and Their Caregivers
DOC.criteria: Adults Patients with a primary highgrade glioma who are treated with chemo or were treated with chemo Caregivers of patients with a primary highgrade glioma who are treated with chemo or were treated with chemo Able to be interviewed Dutch Patients with cerebral metastases Patients and caregivers who withdraw their informed consent Emotionally and cognitive not being able to be interviewed
